hurry.workflow changes
======================

0.9.1 (2006-09-22)
------------------

* first cheesehop release.

0.9 (2006-06-15)
----------------

* separate out from hurry package into hurry.workflow

* eggification work

* Zope 3.3 compatibility work

0.8 (2006-05-01)
----------------

Initial public release.
